ai_instructions.IMPORTANT: DO NOT read raw JSON files! They are 10k+ lines and will consume all tokens.

diversity_fix.issue: _sonSecilenYemekler was instance variable, resetting on each new OgunPlanlayici instance
diversity_fix.solution: Made _sonSecilenYemekler static - now shared across all instances
diversity_fix.result: Diversity mechanism now works correctly, different meals selected each day
